casebody.data:
WILLIAMS
v.
BELL. No. 86P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2005. Edmund L. Gaines, Statesville, Christopher D. Mauriello, Salisbury, for Tonya Williams, et al. Stephen W. Coles, Lexington, for American Bass Fishing.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of February 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Response:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant shall have up to and including the 7th day of March 2005. By order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of March 2005."
